name: Story of one Night
detailed_description:
Story of One night- adventure game with first-person puzzles, immersing a player in a psychological horror setting. You have to use ingenuity to escape from the chilling nightmare, simultaneously trying to get to the core of what is happening.
Collect pieces of information, finding documents and records, and run away from the creepy pursuer. To escape, you have to put all the information found in a single mosaic, which will also reveal the truth about the main character. Only here on the way to it you will find all the new reasons not to wake up ...
